instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1502: What is A1502? A1502 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2014, Late 2013, Early 2015 with EMC 2875, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-3476, 820-3536, 820-4924..

threads.title: MacBook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> - 2015 keyboard and touch pad not working after battery replacement
threads.message: Keyboard and touchpad not working after battery replacement ☹️.

threads.title: MacBook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> - 2015 keyboard and touch pad not working after battery replacement
threads.message: Very likely damaged trackpad board, or flex...

threads.title: MacBook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> - 2015 keyboard and touch pad not working after battery replacement
threads.message: Is it normal that the keyboard stop functioning if the trackpad or it's flex damages ?

threads.title: MacBook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> - 2015 keyboard and touch pad not working after battery replacement
threads.message: Of course, keyboard information goes to PCH through trackpad circuitry.

threads.title: MacBook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> - 2015 keyboard and touch pad not working after battery replacement
threads.message: Just changed the trackpad alone , not the flex ... Now trackpad working but keypad is still not working

threads.title: MacBook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> - 2015 keyboard and touch pad not working after battery replacement
threads.message:
Change trackpad flex too.
You need to discard 100% trackpad flex issue; avoid wasting time, in case all good on MLB.
